text: aur khuda hee ne tum logon ko (pahale pahal) mittee se paida kiya phir natafe se phir tumako joda (nar maada) banaaya aur bagair usake ilm (ijaazat) ke na koee aurat hamela hotee hai aur na janatee hai aur na kisee shakhs kee umr mein jyaadatee hotee hai aur na kisee kee umr se kamee kee jaatee hai magar vah kitaab (lauhe mahaphooz) mein (zaroor) hai beshak ye baat khuda par bahut hee aasaan hai
